noun.description: A member of a group of Turkic peoples inhabiting the region east of the Caspian Sea and south of the Aral Sea, now comprising Turkmenistan and parts of Iran and Afghanistan.
The Turkic language of the Turkmen.

adjective.description: Relating to the Turkmens, their language, or the region they inhabit.

origin: From Persian turkmān, from Turkish tūrkmen; also influenced by Russian turkmen.
